verses.roman:
advaita-gṛhe prabhura vilāsa śune yei jana
acire milaye tāṅre kṛṣṇa-prema-dhana

synonyms: advaita-gṛhe—at the house of Advaita Ācārya; prabhura—of the Lord; vilāsa—the pastimes; śune—hears; yei—one who; jana—person; acire—very soon; milaye—meets; tāṅre—him; kṛṣṇa-prema-dhana—the riches of love of Godhead.
translation: If one hears the activities of the Lord at the house of Advaita Ācārya, he will certainly very soon attain the riches of love of Kṛṣṇa.
